comment: He did a great job when it comes to making sure you understand the concepts. Whatever comes on the test it's either being pulled from the PowerPoints or the objectives. Which he always say try not to focus on memorizing because once you understand the material you should be good with the exams. He do office hours if you need extra time etc.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria

comment: Worst Professor I could ever imagine. A girl asked a question only to be responded with "and what's your point?" HER POINT IS THAT NOTHING YOU SAY MAKES ANY SENSE. He's confusing, gets frustrated when you ask questions, and is rude. He shouldn't be a professor. Will respond to questions with "I don't know" or GOOGLE IT. How does he even have a job?

He ruined my life. Test was hard for no reason. He sucks at explaining the lecture and only reads off the powerpoints. test is application based and man doesn't care if the class average is low. Dont take this class. WILL RUIN YOUR GPA.

goodluck.

Outside of teaching, Caras is probably a really kind person to be around and he seems like a sweet guy. However, in the classroom, it's tough. You really have to teach yourself the material because the professor does. not. know it. Also, this class was super test heavy and homework heavy. Don't recommend.

Had not problem with him. Always responded to emails within 24hrs, teaches material given to him by department head, and kinda older but was really chill. Got a high B with little studying. The tests were pretty hard but it is a higher level Bio course so it was to be expected. I'd take it again with him if needed.

The material used is difficult to understand and lectures don't help either. Participation is an important asset to the class & extra assignments are a definite boost, so make sure to do well! He is easy to reach and good for communication. Do NOT take his class without putting in any extra time for tutoring sessions.

He is probably a cool guy, so I mean no disrespect to him with this rating and this was also his first semester ever teaching (Fall 2023). He doesn't know the material (not even joking), you ask him something, he doesn't know. You go to class, he reads of the presentation... Disappointing that KSU really made us pay for this class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Test heavy

comment: Lectures are a snoozefest and he gets confused by the material he's teaching. Not good at answering questions. PowerPoints and tests are not made by him. There is LC and some group work which isn't that bad. Tests are difficult but you can make up points on the final. Pre and Post lecture work isn't hard just annoying to complete.

I'm serious when I say do not take this professor if you have a choice. He answers questions with "i dont know" and then googles them. I am an A student and made Cs on all his tests. There are group projects, however, they are pretty easy depending on how well your group members do. Don't take this class if you care about ur GPA

This class was self taught and he would not help us out. He would simply give us assignments and was not knowledgeable in what he wanted from the assignment. I do have to say he is a sweet guy however, he is not good about responding to emails in a timely manner. It is not impossible, but the effort and resources aren't there.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Lots of homework

comment: Save yourself a headache and please do not take this professor at any cost. I've never been in class where the professor would be speaking and have actually no idea what he is saying. Saying that he doesn't know how to teach is an understatement. He is unable to explain anything well if you ask him. If I could give a 0/5 I would.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: PLEASE DO NOT TAKE HIM. ITS NOT WORTH IT!!! You are ruining your gpa if you take him. He is incompetent and knows NOTHING about the material. He also grades extremely harsh with no rubric. His exams are made by another professor, and he assigns hw through smartwork. Attendance is mandatory, but lectures leave you more confused. -10000/10

Dude does not know what he's doing. Take his class only if you wanna self-study. You ask him a question and he literally says, "I wouldn't know how to answer that" or he'd google it. Also, lots of group work. We're a class of 198 students and he assigned groups and assigned seating. It's not a class, it's a joke really.

He does not know the answer to any student's question and his quizzes, syllabus, and lecture are all copied from Professor Dovid. If you ask about things on the syllabus he won't know what you are talking about. He's a fine person, but the only way to pass is to teach yourself and avoid being confused by going to lectures.
